0.8 inch Ultra-slim Body Skillfully Concea, Compact Digital Camera, Expeed C2 Image Processing Engine, Special Effects and Filter Effects for Adding Creative Touch, Smart Portrait System, Scene Auto Selector, Subject Tracking, Eye-Fi Card Support, 18 Optimized Scene Modes, USB Charging Via AC Adapter or PC, Monitor: 5-level Brightness Adjustment, Lens Construction: 5 Elements in 5 Groups, Focus Range: 0.5 m (W) - 1.0 m (T), Focus-area Selection: Face Priority, Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical, Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Continuous Shooting: Single (Default Setting), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Exposure Control: Programmed Auto Exposure with Motion Detection and Exposure Compensation ( 2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV), Mechanical Shutter and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture: Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-3.3 AV) Selection, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, Input / Output Terminal; Audio / Video Output, Digital Input / Output (USB), Charging Time: 2 hrs 30 min (Using Charging AC Adapter EH-69P), Battery Life (EN-EL19) Still Pictures: 220 Shots, Movies: 1 hrs 50 min HD 720p (1280 x 720), Maximum File Size for Single Movie 2 GB, Focus Lock, Maximum Recording Time for Single Movie 29 min, Tripod Socket, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Humidity: 85%

Awesome Camera From Nikon.Best Picture Quality.Excellent Zoom.Overall Outstanding Camera!People Who Want To Buy Camera Trust Me This One Is Great!Thumbs Up To Nikon And Flipkart.Great Service!Its Been 4 Months Since I Hve This Camera And I Love It!

not words to sae abt this cam ..itz just amazing...as this is my first camera....

the first words i wanna to talk is abt flipkart ...flipkart SIRJI TUSSI GREAT HO.......[as is ordered my nikon s3200 on 28th june 2013 at 3.50pmand the product was delivered to me just the another day that is 29june 2013 at 12.30 pm]talking abt the cam its just tooooo amazing releated on to the cost as i ordered my first thinking was will its battery will last long...and the cam answer is yes it long last upto 250 photos with full flash....the design of the camera is just awesom ....slim and sweet ... HD videos we can shoot by this cam by 720x1280go for it friends isse sastaa price mein aur accha cam nahi milega....

Just using this product and i am totally satisfied of this amazing product made by NIKON, I have tried all its features.. and it performs nicely.. You will not get any CAMERA like Nikon Coolpix S3200 Point & Shoot in this Price... From my advice "JUST GO FOR IT"

First I would like to thank Flipkart for their good services. They delivered me withing 2 days. I ordered on Wednesday night it was delivered on Friday morning.This camera is good in terms of it's price. It has lots of feature.While taking your picture you can set ur mode according to the environment.Night mode, Beach, Fireworks, Pet and many more.HD videos you can shoot.After taking the snap you can adjust it's clarity, brightness, your face glamor and many thing, which is awesome within this price.Smile timer is there which will take the snap when you smile. Best Shot Selection(BSS) and multiple picture features also included in this model.Drawback is: Panaroma is there but you need a software to join the photos.In short I am very satisfied with the product. Don't stay back go for it. Cheers!!!
